EmailTemplate.subject: Date Change now 6/27/2017| Join EchoStor and Turbonomic for Dinner with a Side of Automation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://echostor.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/Turbo_Dine-n_Dash_Event_Email.html]]> {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Busy schedule keep you from making our dinner tonight? Good news, we have decided to reschedule tonight's dinner for June 27th! To remind you our dinner with a side of automation will be held at Maggiano's in Boston. Please come join EchoStor and Turbonomic <[[https://echostor.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/Turbo_Dine-n_Dash_Event_Email.html]]> for drinks and appetizersÂ as we discuss how to deliver better applications faster regardless of cloud, infrastructure or architecture. After our brief session we will send you home with a dinner for four from one of the best Italian restaurants in all of Boston!
- Host: EchoStor and Turbonomic - When: Wednesday June, 27th 2017, 7PM - Where: Maggianos's Little Italy - Address: 4 Columbus Ave, Boston, MA 02116
RSVP Here <[[https://echostor.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/Turbo_Dine-n_Dash_Event_Email.html]]>.
Please reach out to Grace.Murphy@Turbonomic.com or your account executives for any further questions.
Best,
Your friends at Turbonomic
